pullrequest.title: Embed a copy of tinyxml for windows

content.raw: You may consider applying a [bugfix patch](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/robotology/yarp/master/extern/tinyxml/patches/entity-encoding.patch) to fix incorrect encoding of elements with special characters originally posted at http://sourceforge.net/p/tinyxml/patches/51/ (it's used by the [homebrew formula for tinyxml](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/blob/master/Library/Formula/tinyxml.rb) too).
content.html: You may consider applying a bugfix patch to fix incorrect encoding of elements with special characters originally posted at http://sourceforge.net/p/tinyxml/patches/51/ (it's used by the homebrew formula for tinyxml too).
